DOC.brief_summary: In double blind placebo-controlled cross-over study effect Sildenafil aura migraine headache induction test patient migraine aura .
DOC.criteria: Migraine aura Minimum 2 attacks/year Any type headache , except tensiontype headache < 4 day per month History cardio cerebrovascular disease Hypertension hypotension Any daily intake medication , include prophylactic migraine treatment , except oral contraceptive Pregnancy lactation
